title: ** Lower Price ** T205 Home Run Baker - PSA 2.5, well centered and clean borders
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: ** Lower Price ** T205 Home Run Baker - PSA 2.5, well centered and clean borders
posts.post_content:
T205 Gold Border Frank “Home Run” Baker, HOFer, PSA 2.5

Am offering this really sharp, nicely centered HOFer with great photo image and comparatively clean gold edge borders, hard to find for this card and set - this eye appeal is probably why it got the extra .5 bump in grade

I picked this one up for my “forever” HOF collection… until I found a different Baker to replace it 🙄.  I guess I need to rethink my “forever” tag in my PC!

Am priced a bit aggressively vs some comps due to overall eye appeal - I sometime pay on the higher end of comp range to be sure I get the better quality for the card grade… am cross posting in several places, FYI.

** $435 plus $10 to ship safely **

NOW $385…

Very nice 

Sent from my SM-G998U using Tapatalk
